main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects were reported in Pueblo, Colorado during September 1956, including various descriptions of lights and objects in the sky.
interesting points: Four round objects with red and green flashing lights were observed visually and through binoculars for about two hours., A civilian object was detected on ground-radar and visually observed for 30 minutes but was not seen on radar., One round object, bright like a light and the size of a baseball, was observed for 30 seconds., 15 multi-colored lights were seen in a diamond formation flying silently and steadily for about 3 and a half minutes., Witnesses included military intelligence officers and local civilians.
sighted object: unidentified flying objects including round objects and multi-colored lights
witness description: military intelligence officers and local civilians
